decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - 1. Removal of projecting brick piers at roof parapet level for Blocks A, B and C.
2. Increase parapet height for Blocks A, B and C.
3. Increase communal stair core height for blocks A, B and C to allow direct access to roof level for maintenance.
4. Change of tenure to Affordable Rent and removal of ensuites for Blocks C and D.
5. Block A and B tenure amended to Shared Ownership.
6. Removal of flue and louvres resulting in changes to the energy strategy.
7. All glazing to cycle stores to be obscured to comply with Secure by Design requirements.
8. Secondary refuse store vents added to all blocks to the rear elevations.
9. Privacy screens added to balconies where distance between them is less than 2.5m.
10. Main entrance lobby door configuration amended to suit dry riser and access control requirements to Blocks A, B and C. 
11. Windows located in Block A within plot 2.10, 3.10 and 4.10 repositioned by 450mm (two bricks) and changed to high level window to accommodate kitchen layouts behind.
12. Door added to fifth floor within Block A above energy centre for maintenance purposes.
13. Double external door added to Block B elevation for access, resulting from amended to cleaners store to accommodate life safety plant room.
14. Rear first floor window located in Block B within plot 0.04, single bedroom, reduced in size from a double panel to a single panel to accommodate structural elements.
15. Three ground floor maisonette units within Block B amended as 3B6P units instead of 3B5P. 
16. Full height window within Block B replaced with high level window to accommodate kitchen layouts behind.
17. Amendment to Block C, Core 2, cycle store window.
18. Amendment to Block C, Core 2 window to allow for AOV configuration.
19. Amendment to Block C window to living room within plots 1.02, 202, 3.02 and 4.02 to be fixed shut and glazing to be obscured due to conform to planning condition 12.

Condition : 2 - 20. Amendment to elevational treatment of commercial space within Block D along Primary Road. 
21. Amendment to ground floor of Block D to incorporate a management office with the entrance from Primary Road. 
22. Rear elevation to Block D, Core 1 external finishes amended from brickwork to solid metal cladding
23. Amendment to the curtain walling configuration in Block D to suit dry riser and access control requirements.
24. Parapet levels raised by 150mm to top of roof within Block D to allow for roof build up requirements
25. The replacement from solider course brick setting out to stretcher bond within Block D just below the roof parapet.
26. All precast concrete elements within the fa�ade to be replaced with aluminium with a precast concrete effect finish
27. Sprinkler Room added at ground floor Block A with additional door to rear elevation.
28. Naturally ventilated AOV�s within the communal corridors in Blocks A, B and C1 heights increased to ensure they are 500mm above any surrounding structure.
29. AOV window added above external doors to Block A, Block C Cores 1 & 2 and Block D Core 2, and AOV window added to ground floor of Block D, Core 1.
30. Maisonette entrance doors moved 337.5mm in Block B ground floor.
31. Additional 2 windows to North elevation on 3rd and 4th floor Block A.
32. Energy centre door moved to comply with fire safety regulations.
33. Substation doors positions and sized amended due to requirements from Power On.
34. Substation added to Block A in Zone A1 and substation in Zone A4 moved to opposite side of block.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission P/4610/17 dated 15/12/2017 to enable non-material changes to site-wide ground floor plan and approved plans and elevations for buildings in plots A1 and A4
